Category.name: templatehestonmodel
Category.description: functions and methods for Heston-style models.

Parameter.name: FixParameters
Parameter.description: flags if (theta,kappa,sigma,rho,v0) is fixed in calibration.

Parameter.name: HestonRelTolerance
Parameter.description: relative tolerance for Heston Vanilla pricing.

Parameter.name: HestonMaxEvaluations
Parameter.description: maximum function evaluations for Heston Vanilla pricing.

Parameter.name: MaxEvaluations
Parameter.description: Maximal number of function evaluations in numeric integration.

Member.name: qlRealHestonModelVanillaOption
Member.description: Returns a future zero coupon bond price in the Hull White model.

Parameter.name: MaxEvaluations
Parameter.description: Maximum number of integrand function evaluations in integration.

Member.name: qlActiveHestonModelVanillaOption
Member.description: Returns a future zero coupon bond price in the Hull White model.

Parameter.name: MaxEvaluations
Parameter.description: Maximum number of integrand function evaluations in integration.

Parameter.name: M
Parameter.description: mean reversion level (equal initial stoch vol).

Member.name: qlRealStochVolModelVanillaOption
Member.description: Returns a future zero coupon bond price in the Hull White model.

Parameter.name: MaxEvaluations
Parameter.description: Maximum number of integrand function evaluations in integration.

Parameter.name: Times
Parameter.description: time grid for model parameters (in year fractions).

Parameter.name: M
Parameter.description: mean reversion level (equal initial stoch vol).

Member.name: qlRealTDStochVolModelVanillaOption
Member.description: Returns a future zero coupon bond price in the Hull White model.

Parameter.name: MaxEvaluations
Parameter.description: Maximum number of integrand function evaluations in integration.

Member.name: qlRealTDStochVolModelB
Member.description: Returns skew parameter at time t.

Parameter.name: M
Parameter.description: mean reversion level (equal initial stoch vol).

Parameter.name: OptimizationParams
Parameter.description: [ min(8), max(8), epsfcn, ftol, xtol, gtol, maxfev, glAbsAcc, glMaxEval ]

Parameter.name: TMax
Parameter.description: maximum number of time steps per year.

Parameter.name: TMin
Parameter.description: maximum number of time steps per year.
